title: Ho Ho Ho 2009
description:
<a href="http://i.imagehost.org/0133/ho-ho-ho-796756l-175x0-w-f8cdae64.jpg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://i.imagehost.org/0133/ho-ho-ho-796756l-175x0-w-f8cdae64.jpg</a>

Horace, a kid of 8 years who still believes in Santa Claus receives as a gift to celebrate a day at the mall. What ought to be a normal day of Christmas turns, but a true adventure, when the child loses his mother. He met Johnson, a pickpocket disguised as Santa Claus, who was in the middle of an operation as possible illegal.

Is In Romanian !!! 

Thanks To http://www.softgame.ro/index.php
